activities:
kikin Inc. provides free services and software for the delivery of content and services to users of Internet and mobile browsers and devices. kikin Inc. abides by the Safe Harbor Principles developed by the U.S. Department of Commerce and the European Commission in the provision of all services rendered to users that involves the use of personal data. kikin Inc. may receive: 1) personal data transferred from the E.U. to the U.S. as a software and services provider on behalf of users who have consented to this transfer, and 2) personal data transferred from the E.U to the U.S. for the purposes of employment administration. Kikin Inc. acts as the Data Processor
and Data Collector of such information to provide its service and to employ EU employees.
personaldata: off-line, on-line, manually processed data, human resources data
recoursemech: kikin is committed to cooperating with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
